name: Into the Hive
storyline: Paying homage to classic horror games, Into the Hive melds old-school atmosphere and puzzles with innovative immersive-sim mechanics and visually advanced elements. Along the way, players will encounter menacing insectoid monsters and a mysterious man who adds intrigue to the narrative.
summary: Into the Hive is an immersive first-person shooter horror game, crafted in the nostalgic style of the PlayStation 1 era. Initially developed as an entry for the 32-bit Jam 2021 in a 2 week timeframe.
